courses.title: Introduction to C Programming
courses.description: This course provides a fundamental introduction to the C programming language. Learn the basics of C, including data types, control structures, and functions.

courses.title: Introduction to Algorithms
courses.description: Explore the world of algorithms in this comprehensive course. Understand algorithm design and analysis to solve complex computational problems.

courses.title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
courses.description: Master C++ programming and its applications in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Ideal for aspiring software developers.

courses.title: Basic Data Structures
courses.description: Learn the fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Essential for building efficient algorithms.

courses.title: Introduction to OOP Python
courses.description: Delve into Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) with Python. Understand classes, objects, and inheritance in Python.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Get a comprehensive overview of software engineering principles, including software development methodologies and best practices.

courses.title: AWS, Cloud Computing
courses.description: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing technologies. Learn how to deploy and manage applications in the cloud.

courses.title: Database (MySQL)
courses.description: Master MySQL, a popular relational database management system. Learn SQL, database design, and administration.

courses.title: Problem-Solving Part
courses.description: Enhance your problem-solving skills in software development. Solve real-world coding challenges and algorithmic problems.
